pr_title: Backport fix shared poller OOM to 0.13

timeline.message:
Backport fix shared poller OOM to 0.13

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

Bump versions for 0.13.2

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: We should probably add documentation for this in the Operations.md
timeline.author: Nana-EC
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,8 @@ After=syslog.target
 Description=Hedera Mirror Node GRPC API
 
 [Service]
-ExecStart=/usr/bin/java -jar hedera-mirror-grpc.jar --spring.config.additional-location=file:/usr/etc/hedera-mirror-grpc/ -DLog4jContextSelector=org.apache.logging.log4j.core.async.AsyncLoggerContextSelector -Xmx10g
+ExecStart=/usr/bin/java -Xms5g -Xmx12g -XX:+CrashOnOutOfMemoryError -DLog4jContextSelector=org.apache.logging.log4j.core.async.AsyncLoggerContextSelector -jar hedera-mirror-grpc.jar --spring.config.additional-location=file:/usr/etc/hedera-mirror-grpc/

replies.bodyText: We can, but these are not really suggested memory settings for customers. They're more like "we have all this extra memory on the VM let's use it" settings.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: Also add documentation for these config values in the Operations.md
timeline.author: Nana-EC
